experiences.description: Distributor Management: Regularly visiting town to meet with distributors. Establishing and maintaining strong relationships with distributors. Order Acquisition: Asking orders from local stores and ensuring timely delivery, Tracking sales orders and ensuring accuracy in order fulfillment. Product Feedback: Collecting and analyzing feedback from local stores regarding product performance. Reporting insights and suggestions for improvement to the relevant departments.

Client Engagement: Initiated and maintained relationships with various Aditya Birla Group companies to introduce and promote Powerit chemical products. Product Presentation: Conducted detailed presentations and demonstrations of cleaning and disinfectant solutions to potential clients within the group. Training: Conducted training sessions for client staff on the proper use and benefits of Powerit products. Needs Assessment: Conducted needs assessments and customized product offerings to meet the specific requirements of different offices and facilities within the Aditya Birla Group.
